website_summaries.verdict: These risers ensure you can elevate your bed without damaging your floors.
pros: Bed risers can support up to 6,800 pounds
Can be used on a bed, sofa, and other furniture
Include a removable rubber bottom mat that reduces the risk of scratches and scuffs on wood floors
Square design ensures you can seamlessly vacuum or clean around the risers
cons: May cause a bed to wobble or tip over

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy, my bed legs fell right thru and busted them.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Nighttime acid reflux? Here’s a solution.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I have acid reflux which is worse at night and gastroenterologist recommended elevating the head of the bed. I read the reviews on other similar products and as I wanted a good quality product with minor negative reviews, I decided on this product. It has met my expectations, they are sturdy and there is no movement or slippage if installed properly under the mattress. Be sure to read inserted instructions. I have a king size bed and when lying down on the bed I cannot tell there is an4 inch head elevation. It is a 2 person installation job as mattress has to lifted. I highly recommend as it is a very good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Late night reader

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy. Bought this when I couldn't figure out ...
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy. Bought this when I couldn't figure out how to put the feet on my new couch (turns out I'm supposed to drill my own holes. Screw that.) Put these blocks under the couch and test-tackled it; no wobble. A+
customer_reviews.author: justco

customer_reviews.title: Grab some glue.
customer_reviews.text: The black rubber squares were not glued on and repeated came off until we finally got the bed on this. There was double sided tape on the bottom pieces, that did not do its job well. Other than that they worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Caused dangerous tipping!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these to use on the queen bed in our guest room, but were unable to really use them. From the very beginning, the slightest movement on the bed caused them to tip over. We removed them quickly as we were concerned someone would get hurt. I was really disappointed as I wanted the extra storage and lift for the bed, but it was definitely not worth the risk. We will just make our own out of wood with a deeper inset and sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: NovelMomma

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect, very high quality
customer_reviews.text: I originally tried the 5.5 inch risers for my Ikea Rimforsa kitchen island/work bench but it was just a bit too high so I exchanged for these. High quality incredibly sturdy, no wobble whatsoever. Very happy. I first applied the square rubber caps to the naked stainless steel feet but I probably didn't have to because nothing slides around in these risers. They come with foam inserts for wheeled feet and I used them to snug around the space between feet and riser. They are meant to stay PUT, you cannot move/slide the furniture around with these!
customer_reviews.author: J. BushTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: More Storage Space for Puppies
customer_reviews.text: Ever since he was a puppy, our youngest doggie has liked to sleep under our bed. Just recently we bought a new mattress with an adjustable frame. We Didn't even think to make sure he would have enough space to crawl under the bed when we ordered it. When it came, he had a hard time squeezing under. Then we found these risers! Now he can crawl under into his favorite sleepy spot! These are very sturdy and stable. We sense ZERO movement on them and our bed is higher (but not so high that he can't jump up onto the bed when he wakes up!) All in all an excellent product and exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: It brought our litchen table up to the perfect height for rolling out dough.
customer_reviews.text: My husband makes an Eastern European delicacy called Potica. He must roll out the dough super thin and it covers an area about 40 X 65 inches. It must be fully rolled out very quickly before he can spread on the walnut or pecan & honey filling. Our kitchen table is too low for him to do all that rolling out without causing back pain. These are a godsend! Hubby was concerned that the lifts would slide as he was rolling the dough. But the risers didn't move at all! I wish that we'd have found and ordered these last year. We both highly recommend this great product.
customer_reviews.author: SuziQ

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. These bed risers are strong, sturdy, and keep the bunk bed stable. I used them for a metal full over twin bunk bed that gets a ton of use by tweens who bounce and climb. The bed was too low to utilize space underneath for plastic storage bins thus this purchase. The risers are just the right lift I needed. They are made of tough plastic with rubber bottom. The top has a square indentation with hard foam lining to securely hold the bed post and prevent the parts from sliding inside. I couldn't be happier and highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: mamma3

customer_reviews.title: Not just for lifting beds!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to raise my DVD recorder UP so I could easily use the remote when the cabinet door was closed. I thought about bricks or wood pieces, but then after searching Amazon for “lifters”, I found these. I thought 4 probably 2 too many, but after placing 2 I realized all four corners of the unit would benefit from the stability. I think it looks nice too! Thinking outside the box! Well packaged, shipped fast, made in AMERICA...win, win!
customer_reviews.author: E. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! My bed has wheels on the bottom since the bed frame broke and it's on a wooden floor so the bed would always move around easily. With these, the bed always stays in place! And it looks great! It matches the wood floor very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cat

customer_reviews.title: Just what 2 old people needed
customer_reviews.text: We used them to raise are couch and love seat. They were too low. Were elderly so holding up couches was a little difficult. We piled books under the sides of couches to hold them up so we had room to place the risers. Worked out great. Now we dont have to struggle to get off couches.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie q

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for and adjustable bed !
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on an adjustable bed and was worried they would not work d/t the round legs of the bed and the heaviness of an adjustable bed. These are Excellent !, the round legs fit in fine because the product gives you fitting variations and they are so strong and durable, they have handled the weight of the adjustable bed with no problems or breakage. hold the bed legs securely. Also includes a rubber bottom for no slid or scratching of your flooring. Gave my bed the lift I wanted so not have to climb up out of my bed and to have lots of storage underneath. Highly recommend these !
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Risers but Not easily adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I tried my new risers on two different beds. Neither bed fit inside the opening on top. One bed had rounded legs that were bigger than the riser's openings. The other bed had rectangular legs that were longer than the openings. I currently have the risers under the bed with the rectangular legs with the legs resting across the top of the riser holes, not inside the holes as designed. I'm not sure how stable this will be longterm, but for now it is stable. Hopefully the legs resting across will not cause the riser to crack at some point. The risers are well made and may fit some beds very nicely, just did not fit mine.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: These are just the right height. I wanted just a little more space under the bed. I have an electric bas that would not allow my under the bed storage containers unless the bed was completely flat. These risers gave me the room I needed to use my storage containers under the bed and not make the bed so high that it would require a step ladder for me to get on and off the bed. I am only 5'2". These riders are well made and sturdy that easily handles the weight of my bed and electric base (plus me and my dogs). Love them, Will recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: lollipopp58

customer_reviews.title: Bed risers - tips
customer_reviews.text: We got the risers for a bed skirt that was too long. Make sure you have the bed exactly where you want it because when the risers are in place you can't move it. They are sturdy and make a big difference! We kept the casters in place and put them into the risers. The two rubber pieces that come with each riser secures the casters.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great for raising a recliner
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our application. My mom had her knee replaced in early March, and had a lot of trouble getting in/out of her recliner because it’s pretty low. Her recliner is a higher-end lazyboy with four legs on engineered hardwood floors. they don’t slip or slide. And because the wood tone is similar to both the legs of the chair and the floor, it doesn’t look funny. This is really perfect for her, as it really increased her overall mobility because raising it several inches just made it easy to get in/out without pain.
customer_reviews.author: alj5

customer_reviews.title: DESCRIPTION NEEDS ALL SIZES PRINTED
customer_reviews.text: THE 2" IS GREAT FOR THE CHAIR WITH THE CHAIR LEGS FITTING INTO THE SPACE.. BUT THINKING WE MIGHT NEED THE 3" INSTEAD, WE ORDERED IT, BUT THE CHAIR LEGS WERE LARGER THAN THE OPENING. WE ASSUMED THEY WOULD BE THE SAME OPENING AT THE TOP AS THE 2" BUT WE WERE WRONG AND ARE SENDING THE 3" BACK. KEEPING THE 2", SO FAR.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Great way to raise sewing/cutting table
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid quilter but unfortunately lately I noticed my right upper arm really bothering me. It seems it is from pressing down on the rotary cutter for too long a period. I cut down on the time I used it during the day but it didn't seem to solve my problem. I then got the suggestion to raise my cutting table. So I bought these "bed raisers" and put them under the legs of my table. They raised my table a good 3". What a difference!! I could feel the difference almost immediately. A lot cheaper alternative than going to a chiropractor!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie R. Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect As Cat Tree Lift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 3" risers for my cat tree. I have a cat tree in my basement for my furbaby Poe. I bought a cat tree so Poe can lay down while watching the birds out the basement window. I needed something to lift his cat tree higher & be stable at the same time. Poe is 16 lbs so when he jumps the cat tree needs to be stable. These risers combined with thick boards are perfect for the job! Now Poe is SO happy sleeping & sitting watching the birds! Gotta have a happy furbaby!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Appreciated six pack!
customer_reviews.text: I was glad this was available in a six pack since most king beds need six. Everything appears to be well made and solid. Positioning all six risers correctly on carpet was a little tricky but doable, especially while keeping the rubber piece below the riser. Once installed, bed is stable and high enough to provide additional storage and easy carpet cleaning underneath. Glad I found these.
customer_reviews.author: Fred J. Fagergren

customer_reviews.title: Repurposed/off-label uses, too!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to raise the privacy picket fence we have around our A/C. The fence was too short for the new, bigger A/C, and these hard plastic lifts we're perfect for this. I like the square shape (not tapered). The black color blends in with our black mulch, and the fence now is just above the unit. I'm sure the rubber bottoms would help a bed not move around for traditional use of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kokocito

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The second I put the couch on these, I knew it wasn’t going to work. I did not feel stable on these at all. The legs do not sit far into the riser, they sit right on top. That is not what I was looking for to support a couch. Definitely feel that the cheap ones I used in my college dorm were better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Owyn Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Holding up a Vanity works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to increase the height of my bathroom vanity unit. Works great! These units are very good quality. The rubber bottom foot part does NOT attach to the unit. This doesn't affect me since I am not moving the vanity around, but I don't recommend this to anyone who might be lifting the unit off the ground frequently, because the rubber foot will not stay in place. :)
customer_reviews.author: Carl and Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great risers
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed by these lifting blocks. I was going to cut pieces of wood to lift our new bed, then I found these on Amazon. I was concerned how sturdy they would be. The frame wheels actually fit nice and snug in the tops and aid in support. We got the 3" rise and they worked great. The top of our bed is level with the night stands and we can slide stuff under the bed for added storage 😁. They seem strong, I hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: stcj

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I tent camp with a folding twin bed frame. My new tri fold mattress doesn’t make it tall enough for me to get up easily with my knee issues. These risers were the perfect solution! Not only do they raise my bed enough to help me get up, it prevents the frame legs from puncturing the tent floor. They would also prevent damage to my soft wood floors at home. I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Branch

customer_reviews.title: Well Engineered & No Slip
customer_reviews.text: We've tried other chair lifters, and these are by far the safest--the primo's rubber bottoms keep the chair from slipping around, and don't scratch my wood floors; the extra inserts make the chair legs more secure. Good problem solving design, well-manufactured. (A cheaper set from a different manufacturer lurched around when I sat in it; the chair leg slipped off the lifter and about threw me across the room.)
customer_reviews.author: westmoreland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to use with wheels and platform bed.
customer_reviews.text: I can't add much more to the other 5 star reviews other than to say my Cal King frame has wheels that I didn't want to remove. The risers have slots specifically for wheels that hold them in place. There's no wiggling and I feel totally secure with the risers. ** Update 12/19... I replaced my mattress frame with a platform (Ziyoo brand purchased here on Amazon, btw.). The legs are rectangle and put almost perfectly within the inserts provided by iPrimio to hold the wheels in place. Still loving them!
customer_reviews.author: K. Negrete

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Bought a platform bed frame that was supposed to have 14" clearance to store totes under. It actually was 13" clearance. So needed a few extra inches. Had tried some other risers before on another bed that promptly broke. These risers though are much better made and so far are doing the job. I think if I need any in the future I will for sure look at these. The totes fit now under the bed with ease and the risers seem to be very sturdy. They are a little clunky.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of these, to raise up a King sized bed. One set came in with all the proper parts, the other had one of the rubber pads for the bottom was the wrong size and would not fit the riser. SInce i do not have the time to wait for this to be replaced, i just cut it and taped it in place since it wont be seen. If I had access to a nice craft store, i would replace the rubber bottoms with some nice felt so it would be able to slide on the tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: DruAdams81

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our couch
customer_reviews.text: We have the IKEA Kivik sofa and its legs are only 1.5" high. Unfortunately, replacement legs don't work, so we found these instead. The sofa legs are 2.5" square and fit perfectly into the space on these risers. They square risers mimic the shape of the sofa legs. The extra 3.5" height puts us right where we want to be sitting. My husband says it feels like a grown-up sofa instead of a frat house couch. They are as advertised, and look even better than we hoped. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: evk0109

customer_reviews.title: They're working for me!
customer_reviews.text: If only I knew about these before my two spinal surgeries. Having to pull myself up from a bed that's too low has been torture. But now it's a bit easier. I picked these because the weight they tested it to seemed impressive. I didn't want a dinky bedframe where during the night I hear creak creak boom and I'm on the floor. So far so good. I bought the 6 pk 3 inch risers for my queen size bed. A higher set would've given me underbed storage but this is better than before. And they're made in my home state yesssss!
customer_reviews.author: Fefelamour

customer_reviews.title: 3 Inch Furniture Riser
customer_reviews.text: I used these to raise my computer desk so my chair would be able to roll under the keyboard tray. Very simple design, has a rubber bottom and 2 neoprene shims to hold the wheels in place. No complaints other than you need to take care to keep the bottom rubber pad in place so it doesn't slip off. Very stable and holds the weight just fine. I'd buy them again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Kline

customer_reviews.title: Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby and I both have joint replacements (and other joints that need replacing), which makes getting up/down from a low couch difficult. These risers are inobtrusive and bring the couch seat just high enough for comfort. Yet I can still reach the floor with my feet while sitting. Perfect! I'm 400 lbs and he's about 250, so definitely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: D. McRae

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: These work really well to raise my bed frame by 3 inches. This allows me to use my new 12 inch memory foam mattress with a 100 inch wide quilt. Be sure your bed or other piece of furniture is in place where you want it, as it's difficult to move around with these risers on. And that's a good thing, as my bed does not slide around. I used 6 on my bed. I could have used 8, but feel confident 6 is enough support for my full size bed. I only wish they came in a dark brown color that would match my dark brown headboard and footboard better.
customer_reviews.author: Ledsteplin

customer_reviews.title: Raised a metal outdoor table
customer_reviews.text: I raised my heavy outdoor metal table 3” to make it dining height instead of conversation height. The foam spacers fit at right angles on two sides of the table feet. So they did not sit in the middle of the blocks but they work perfectly anyway. The rubber pad bases even work as shims on the slightly uneven concrete so that it doesn’t wobble. It looks pretty good even with the offset foot since the table is hexagonal, but it would be nice to have other size foam pieces so the table foot could be centered. Still, it’s rock solid so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Senior

customer_reviews.title: I even got an added bonus I wasn’t expecting
customer_reviews.text: Raises the bed just those few inches that I needed. Beds at a more comfortable height and I can use the space under the bed now for storage. The only thing is, make sure you set the bed exactly where you want it because these will make it hard to move. So in effect you have to constantly put your bed back in place so that’s an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Great to raise your furniture.
customer_reviews.text: My mom had knee replacement and had trouble sitting on my couch when she came to visit. I bought these to raise my couch so she wouldn't have to sit so low. These worked great and it was much easier for get sit on and get off of the couch. She's since gone home and I still prefer the couch elevated. Great if you have senior family members who have trouble getting off of furniture if it's too low.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Simon

customer_reviews.title: High quality and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to raise my elderly mother's sofa. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the product! The risers are made with a thick material and are very sturdy. They have rubber caps that can be put on the bottom to prevent floor scratches and slippage. They also come with metal inserts so the legs don't poke or fall through the riser. I did not need the other inserts that came with the product that change the opening from square to rectangular (used for bed rollers). I feel confident that my mom will be safe on her now-taller sofa. I would definitely recommend this product and would buy it again. AND they are made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good solid product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom's couch which sat very low and was impossible for her to sit on bc it her her knees to get back up. Her couch is super heavy so I was concerned about lifters sliding and falling over but she's been using these for about a month and so far so good! She's finally able to enjoy her couch again!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Solid and amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to raise the bed up in my sons dorm room so he could have storage under his bed. These lifts are extremely solid and I dont dre them collapsing with my son that is 6'3 280lbs laying on his bed. There is a rubber film on the bottom to keep them from scratching the floor so that's a plus too.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Best ones yet
customer_reviews.text: These are the 3rd risers we have tried and they are easily the best - and it’s not even close. The rubber stoppers pull out and can be pushed back in two different ways to customize your fit. Also, the rubberized bottom easily removes for people with carpets to prevent any unwanted marks. Soooooo sturdy. A+ product
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: I placed six of these under a futon , about 440 pounds with the heavy mattress. It is extremely sturdy. I only wish there was a way to attach them to the legs so I could move the whole thing without repositioning the lifts or altering them compromising the weight capacity. I approve these for lifting all furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Pirate Face

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: These risers are great! We can now slide plastic storage tubs under the bed, which is so AWESOME and helps us keep clutter out of view. Strong and sturdy and we have not ever had a problem with them falling or coming off the bed frame. We even bought a set to raise up our night stands, since the bed was higher once we put the risers on. They worked great for that purpose as well.. Highly recommend this great product
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the rubber bottom
customer_reviews.text: The rubber bottom "plate" is totally unnecessary (except maybe on hard wood floors, and then comes off during the process of pushing them underneath the bed frame wheel. This just loses it a star since they could have made the rubber just a bit smaller and it would have stayed on fine. Otherwise, very sturdy and do the job once installed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Alsop

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: So me being the scary-cat I am was hesitant to use these bad boys. We have a huge, heavy king sized bed plus the combined weight of my husband and myself made me think we were going to snap through these. They do a great job of holding all that weight up plus whatever dogs decide to jump on us. It gives us enough room underneath to put the flat storage containers with ease. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works great with a slight modification
customer_reviews.text: This is a reasonably heavy-duty product--plenty strong enough to support a bed plus its occupants. The inner platform that the bed frame actually sits on is a little oversized, as it has to be to hold a variety of frame feet, and the inserts provided did not keep the round pads at the base of my bad frame from sliding around. I cut them to fit the circumference of the pads, and it is now rock solid.
customer_reviews.author: Good Guy

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Mother in law at risk for aspiration so the speech therapist suggested these blocks! Put at the head of her bed and it just lifted the bed enough. Very easy to use. If your bed has wheels there was a place in the blocks for the wheel to sit in without rolling. If no wheels the indent could be blocked off. Nice packaging
customer_reviews.author: Karen DeBenedictis

customer_reviews.title: Bed risers
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my bed on line and when it arrived it was lower than expected. I remembered from my health care days that they used these in the hospitals and decided to give them a try. So far so good, I purchased the six pack as my bed has six legs or base. Easy to insert and now I can sit without going too low and also store items under my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Addie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for V
customer_reviews.text: These risers were exactly what I was looking for to raise my sofa. I wear a prosthetic and the sofa was too low. I am going to purchase another set for my easy chair which is also too low now. They are incredibly sturdy and I definitely would recommend them. The silicon nonslip rubber bottom is an added plus on my tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred FredelTop Contributor: Drums

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bed not moving
customer_reviews.text: Have my low profile bed a good height. Looks sturdy. It arrived fast. I did not expect this to be heavy box. Perfect for my zinus elite smart base bed frame. I cannot stand in a low bed . This gave my bed the right height. The rubber pad is good it helps my bed not to move . It protect my wood floor
customer_reviews.author: San VA

customer_reviews.title: changed Dad's life
customer_reviews.text: He was having a real hard time getting up out of the chair. He is a tall man, and the chair was just too low. Adding these risers made it much easier for him to get out of the chair and we didn't have to spend a LOT more money to get one of those recliners that lifts up.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Reader

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Secure
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these in hopes that they would work and be durable. Yes these bed risers are exactly that! No worries about my hardwood floor, or the risers shifting leaving me in a possibly bad situation. Took less than 10 minutes to install all six for my queen size bed frame. Results are actually better than anticipated. I have a spinal cord injury and these well made devices help me out tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Oktobehr

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because my senior dog could no longer get under my bed easily. These Bed Risers worked like a charm. And they’re sturdy. They stay in place. And they added another 3 inches to the height of my bed. My dog can easily get underneath the bed now and have a peaceful rest. If you have a need to raise any furniture in your household look no further. I think you’ll be very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susand

customer_reviews.title: Jury Still out
customer_reviews.text: I have Wheel caster bed frame so my options are limited with these bed risers. When I saw this product with the stop blocks I was encouraged I may have found a solution. But not so fast while I have successfully installed blocks on my bed I still have my reservations cause the stop blocks that are to keep my wheels from aren't exactly in flush and I guess at any time they could pop out
customer_reviews.author: Howard H. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great product! -- Terrific Service!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We received the product very timely. Had a couple of questions about the items received. Got in touch with the vendor. He contacted me promptly; explained about how the items I received work; apologized for lack of one item. Over-nighted the item I did not get. We have installed the risers and they not only look good but work just the way we had hoped. We highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doing the job!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to raise our mattress to allow for more under-bed storage. Purchased a new box spring and mattress and the new box spring was not as high as our previous one. Needed to raise it to accommodate our existing bedspread. So far so good! Also liked that this is an American company.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Work well, but a little tippy
customer_reviews.text: I am using 6 of these on my king size bed. I had to be sure that the bed legs are directly in the middle of the riser pad, or it wants to tip a bit one way or another. With 6, I don't think the bed will tip over, but I could see how using 4 on a couch or smaller bed might not be great.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Ramsdell

customer_reviews.title: These work awesomely!
customer_reviews.text: These lifts were perfect for our low riding couch. They seem sturdy, well made and slip proof. When our package arrived, we were missing one of the rubber bottoms. Contacted the manufacturer via Amazon. Response was immediate and missing piece was sent in a timely fashion. I would buy from this seller again in a heartbeat! Thank you for a perfect product and buying experience.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Wiegand

customer_reviews.title: Rise up Futon
customer_reviews.text: It was kind of hard to get up from the futon [ 70 years old]. and this is working great so far. I just put them on a few days ago and waiting for company to see how they hold up. This my 2ed set. I bought the 6 in for may bed and the best thing since butter. I just slide out of bed and have lots of storage. Just wish i could find a bed skirt long. But it is worth making one. LOVE IT>
customer_reviews.author: mickey

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after buying a metal platform bed frame that was several inches shorter than what was specified. I bought these rather than returning the bed frame so that I could fit my storage boxes under the bed. My king sized bed needed 9 risers, so I bought one 4 pack and one 6 pack. They are very sturdy, noise free and stay in place. And they are not too big and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Warriorcat27

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: There is a little movement getting in and out of bed, but overall no big deal. Was concerned that while engaging in extra curricular activity that they may fail but zero problems. So I give 5 stars because of above reasons and it did raise my bed to make it more easier getting in and out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Books4ever

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I am actually pleasantly surprise in this product. I was concerned that the wheels of my bed frame would not fit into the top and be stable but they did and they were. There are little pads that you put on each side of the wheel so that they are snug. After positioning the bottoms which had rubber so they don’t move, the bed seemed very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: They Really Worked
customer_reviews.text: The iPrimio Bed risers came in time to raise our bed before our new mattress arrived. I didn't have the time to order a platform bed to replace my standard bed frame. So getting this set saved me time and money. Easy to use and install. Once the mattress was on the foundation the weight helped stabilize the risers. Worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: Cia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product !
customer_reviews.text: My metal king bed frame was on casters on a ceramic tile floor so would move if grandkids jumped on bed. I needed a frame that was sturdier so decided to order these for a few dollars before spending lot more money for a new frame. So glad I did! My frame casters fit perfectly in these risers and the rubber bottoms make the bed almost impossible to move. Best purchase I could have made!
customer_reviews.author: DDB

customer_reviews.title: 100% Best quality out there.
customer_reviews.text: I weigh over 450 pounds. These are amazing even a child can put them together! They are built very very well. Can even be used for a bed with the tiny wheels. I think this company is amazing also because they donate money to a good cause. I will share this good news with people that need to raise furniture for disabilities. Without these I was bedridden. Now I can use my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Snail Mail Queen

customer_reviews.title: Can be used for more than furniture riser
customer_reviews.text: We recently put in a utility sink in our basement and needed to raise the sink higher than floor level so the drain could connect to the drain pipe. It was suggested we build a platform under the sink and I didn't want to take away storage space under the sink. I found these on amazon and decided to give it a try. We place each riser under each of the tub legs and it worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Risers work great on the couch
customer_reviews.text: These look nice, were well boxed, all pieces were included & easy to use. The higher couch feels sturdy, & is much easier to get up from.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Come apart into 3 separate pieces times 4!
customer_reviews.text: I used these to raise the height of a bedroom chair that was very low and difficult to get up from. These have parts that nest, and the parts kept separating as we kept trying to adjust the placement of the legs while holding the chair up in the air for each leg. These are so difficult to keep together. The bottom rubbery piece sticks to the carpet and does not slide so it kept popping off the main support form. A real pain to use!! Sturdy, but difficult!
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: These risers RULE!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! These risers are FABULOUS! I recommend them for anyone buying risers for college bound students! I needed to raise a bed frame for an older person who has difficulty getting up from a “ regular/ normal” height bed. I purchased the 6 pack to support the 6 feet of the bed frame. THESE RISERS DO NOT MOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Manya

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: it's sturdy and using these to my couches really made them more comfortable! there's no sliding around. however, the bottom rubber padding was really annoying. it just comes off way too easily. was a pain when trying to put these stands under my couch in the first place
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: These are best risers I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This product is designed with safety and style in mind and doesn't disappoint! Ingenious design gives you plastic that will never crumple with use over the years. They are attractive enough that I don't mind that they show under my modern sofa. Using the included pads allows you to adjust these for legs of different sizes-- no more sofa falling off the risers!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Safe, sturdy, do not slide, good height for bad knees.
customer_reviews.text: Rocking recliners are very comfortable and have become popular again. However, people with disabilities, who have trouble especially with their knees, hcan find it very difficult to arise from their recliners. The rocking function makes it even harder. These risers are just right for our person. They fit the recliners that have the metal, individual feet, as opposed to the more common wooden front-back pairs. Risers are very sturdy and do not slide. They are an affordable "fix" for folks who cannot afford a new, higher, stationary chair or an electronic lift chair.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I had a modern, expensive bed (Blue Dot) that sits on the floor and decided that not only is it just a little odd looking but difficult to get out of. I bought these to raise it a few inches and can't believe how much more attractive it is. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: EJK

customer_reviews.title: 3" Square Risers
customer_reviews.text: I tried these to raise the head of our bed. Unfortunately, they didn't work well because they lack stability. They really need to be wider at the bottom to prevent tipping over. Other than that, they are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: C Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We used 8 of these to raise an old vanity up that was on carpet. It didn’t have legs, it has a frame and base for the drawers, no wood flat bottom. So we used these with the liner in contact with each corner front and back of the base. We were able to create a very stable vanity. These are made well.
customer_reviews.author: Landry F.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I was worried about them actually holding up to the weight, but they've surprised me. Combined weight of my boyfriend and I are probably 530 pounds. After a year of using them, I am still pleased. We've never knocked a wheel out of the stand, either. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tiramisu

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I installed these at the head of our California King bed, and because it's so wide, I needed one for the leg in the middle. So, I have one spare. They raised the head of the bed about 3.5-inches, which I think helps my digestive system. They appear to be well constructed, and should last a long time. Also, they make it so much easier to watch TV as I fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Dawson III

customer_reviews.title: Worth paying extra!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth paying a little extra!!! I got them for my son's daybed to have room for storage underneath. I looked at ALOT of bed risers feeling very uneasy with many reviews saying they cracked, shifted, etc....these are perfect! Now feel 100% comfortable , they are super stable and the daybed does not shift at all. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: hassunshine

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I put these under my loveseat and they feel great. I'm a big guy so I was a little wary at first, but they feel very sturdy. And the added height makes it much easier to stand up. If I need more furniture risers in the future this will be my first stop.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Easler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product to make more room under your bed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to have more underbed storage. These are so easy to use. I had them in place in a couple of minutes. They have additional pieces to add if your bed frame is on wheels, to add more stability. I am super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Givens

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Omg the worst. Im so irritated. Got them today and the rubber base thing wont stay on, which makes setting them up really fun. The couch is very wobbly. I hate these things. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Does the job! Solid and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job to help with my GERD issues. Initially tried 5” which was too high. We kept sliding to the foot of the bed! These are solid and gives me the elevation at the head of the bed I need. Definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Gelly

customer_reviews.title: No Wobble
customer_reviews.text: I was proud to get these. My couch sat way to low to the floor. The legs on my couch don't screw on so I needed this kind of thing. I was worried about them being unstable or wobblily but they worked out great. On my couch you can't see them unless you look really hard because there is a skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great pruduct.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to life our bed a few inches and these worked out just fine. We have a king size bed and they hold the weight of the frame, foundation and mattress plus two adults. I also purchased two sets for a sofa and loveseat which was a little low for me to get off of. I just wish they weren't so visible on the sofa and loveseat.
customer_reviews.author: Frances S.

customer_reviews.title: The best riser you will buy so just click and order ...
customer_reviews.text: We used 6 on on king bed, the frame casters fit the indentation perfectly. We have a Temperpedic mattress set and our combined body weight is 375, absolutely not one single concern after a month of use. The best riser you will buy so just click and order now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kehm

customer_reviews.title: Rise Up
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make it easier for my wife to get in and out of bed. They raised everything up 3" and now she can stand up easily from the bed or sit down on it. She has mobility issues. Easy to install if you have a scissors jack on hand and no one else around to help you.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Beatrice

customer_reviews.title: Super happy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to raise our futon couches to a normal level, they work so great! I was concerned risers would make the couches slide or be unstable, but these have rubber on both top and bottom and are nice n heavy. Super happy w them, well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Williams

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: 75 years old with bad knees, needed something to raise my recliner. This is a quality product, arrived when promised, simple and easy to install, did just what I needed it to do. I also knew the company made quality products, as we have used their Never Curl rug grippers at the church for several years.
customer_reviews.author: woody quinn

customer_reviews.title: Bought for mother in-law
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law had a problem with her bed being too low. Purchased these blocks to raise her bed up. Not only are they very sturdy, she had no problem getting out of her bed much less stress on her. Definitely worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Ron G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: These things worked amazing my son outgrew his desk his legs got too long but the desk is a beautiful piece of wood furniture I bought these to put it under the desk to make it a little taller and they did the job!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for queen or king sized beds
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a 6 pack of bed risers but these worked well! Glad I went with this option.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Black

customer_reviews.title: Great product, sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought an antique head and footboard but when I put it together with rails the bed was uneven. These are what I wanted to fix the problem. I wish they were a tiny bit smaller as the bed frame is smaller than the risers. Very sturdy and you better have them where you want them when you put the bed on because they stay in place. I have them on wood floors and use the rubber covers, but I can see how they would work just as well on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Cornett

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I used these to raise my couch, and now I can sit with my knees bent comfortably at 90 degrees. I haven't been able to test the full weight capacity yet, but I can say that these risers are made well and don't slide around thanks to the rubber feet.
customer_reviews.author: windmillion

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy bed risers. Unfortunately our son’s college apartment bed posts would not fit down in these even though they are some of the largest on the market. We actually wound up using them as a riser for his dorm fridge. Worked perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Donohoe

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The risers are excellent quality. We used these to heighten our sofa and loveseat. As seniors this allows easier access when sitting and standing. We are amazed at the difference these risers make to access our furniture.
customer_reviews.author: D Bohland

customer_reviews.title: Best bed risers on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several types of bed risers, but this product is by far the best designed. The block is sturdy, it has a protective pad on the bottom to keep it from sliding on uncarpeted surfaces, and the top has two removable hard rubber adjusters that make it possible to make the bed roller fit snugly in the block. Best of all, the company produced the blocks in three heights so you get just the right amount of storage space beneath your bed. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne P.

customer_reviews.title: Get these
customer_reviews.text: These are the only bed risers you want. They work, they're solid, and they actually look a lot better in person than they do online. I have the brown at the bottom of my espresso finish platform bed and they are barely noticeable. I only got 4 forgetting that my Zinus queen size platform frame (which is also awesome) has 3 extra legs down the middle, and now my mattress is starting to sag in the middle so I'm ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Super strong and good height
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing ! Not to tall like the other ones, and 100000 times stronger. Exactly what I needed! And i love the rubber bottoms and inserts they come with if your bed is on wheels. 5 stars all day !!!
customer_reviews.author: Sean + Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Square is good.....
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are square, and an extra bonus/surprise is the small ‘bumper-like’ insert to reduce the legs space. These are created for wheels, but I used the risers with a foldable table (to increase height for sewing) and found them good for keeping the legs in place. The shape also lets me move them closer to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

product_meta.title: iPrimio Bed and Furniture Square Risers - 3 INCH Rise Size - Wont Crack & Scratch Floors - Heavy Duty Rubber Bottom - Patent Pending - Great for Wood and Carpet Surface (Black, 4)
feature_bullets: ELEVATION UP TO 3 INCHES PER RISER & LIFTS OVER 6,800 LBs PER LEG – Everybody loves elevated bed or sofa and it looks more elegant but the biggest reason is storage. iPrimio Bed Square Shaped Riser gives maximum elevation up to 3" and highest lift over support with anti-slip padded foam grip to prevent from sliding and slipping.

DURABLE ABS PLASTIC RISER WITH FULLY PADED BOTTOM – Our bed risers are made up of heavy duty ABS plastic engineered to safely handle the weight without occurring any dent or crack on hardwood or hard surfaces
EXTREME SOLID DESIGN WITH TOP FOAM PAD PREVENTS ROLLING – Our furniture riser is equipped with fully padded top and bottom which prevents rolling of caster wheels.

MULTI-UTILITY FITS ON MOST HOME FURNITURES – This home furnishing accessory fits into raising up desks, chairs, sofas, caster wheel furniture and beds. Its strength can handle heavy duty furniture and protects your floors, gives you storage space

LAB TESTED AND 100% CRACK FREE WARRANTY FROM REGISTERED BRAND ON AMAZON – Other risers crack easily in spite of assurances and that has become the highest rated complaint of consumers but IPRIMIO risers offer 100% warranty against cracking and have been

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,196 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
